text: Hagi ana ofama hu'zana witiramine kasefa wainine olivi masaveramina erita tagra maka Israeli vahe'motane, Livae naga'enena, Ra Anumzamofo mono nompima eri'zama e'neri'za zuomparamima nentazage'za, ana tava'onte'ma pristi vahe'ene mono nomofo kafante'ma kvama nehaza vahe'ene, zagamema nehaza vahe'ma nemasafinka erita ome antegahune. Ana nehuta Anumzantimofo mono nona tagerakanita tamefira huomigosune huta hu'none.
